DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year age Locally advanced metastatic ( stage III/IV ) nonsmall cell lung cancer EGFR mutation Measurable disease accord RECIST criterion ECOG performance status 02 Adequate haematological , renal liver function Previous chemotherapy therapy EGFR metastatic disease History another malignancy , except situ carcinoma cervix , adequately treat basal cell skin carcinoma , radically treat prostate carcinoma good prognosis Symptomatic cerebral metastasis Preexisting parenchymal lung disease pulmonary fibrosis Concomitant use coumarins
